scripts.qvn:publish: docker buildx build -f Dockerfile --platform linux/amd64 --tag switchboardlabs/qvn:dev-$(cat ../../version)  -m 10g --pull --push ../../
scripts.docker:build: docker buildx build -f Dockerfile --platform linux/amd64 --tag qvn -m 10g --pull --load ../../
scripts.build:tar: pnpm docker:build && docker save --output qvn.tar qvn && chmod a+rw qvn.tar && cp qvn.tar ../function-manager/files/qvn.tar
